rules_text:
Whenever Nicola, Inspired Artist attacks, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

rules_text2:
[i]Delirium[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, you may sacrifice [i]Night Upon the Cosmos[/i]. If you do, put two cards you own from outside the game into your hand.
{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
